Text:
Thanks,
           shed a few tears when i was younger
when i first saw this,great movie.

I normally hate Disney movies and my daughter thinks all old (pre-2008) movies are "retarded" but we loved this. I can't see how it made any money but this is a really charming engaging story and light-years away from the "wild roller-coaster rides" with the celebrity voices and CGI eye-candy of today. This made you really care about the characters and had the dramatic impact of a stage play. It was great!! Not for everyone.
